title: What are Twenty One Pilot's 'sleeper songs'? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are amazing playlists and compilationd on YouTube, I have severe anxiety and have a lot of trouble falling asleep, I feel extremely restless. I often use these compilations to fall asleep, I hope they'll help you too :) Tyler singing you to sleep:  Tyler singing you to sleep, again:  Tyler singing you to sleep with his ukulele, blurryface era:  Tyler singing you to sleep, vessel era:  Tyler singing you to sleep, trench era:  51 minutes of relaxing twenty one pilots for you to fall asleep:  And finally, a bonus for you :) Talk to me by Cavetown:  It's a song I use in my worst times, it calms me down amazingly, and always helps me fall asleep <3 Hope you like these fren, stay alive ||-//

Um, I’m going out on a limb, I’ve never heard of a sleeper song. But I am going to guess that you mean something to fall asleep to…? Tyler gets pretty loud in most of his songs, so there aren’t many, but here’s a few. Oh Miss Believer Truce We Don’t Believe What’s On TV Stressed Out Level of Concern Hope I helped! Stay alive, guys!
